place_description: Seattle-based coffeehouse chain known for its signature roasts, light bites and WiFi availability.

reviews_data.review_text: This is one busy Starbucks, but they have a hard-working staff that gets those orders out and made well. This location is part of the decision to bring back a more inviting atmosphere. They have a loft with tables and seats on both levels, making this a good place to relax or get some work done. Nice location overall.

I was in this location around 5 o'clock and we use the drive-through and I wanna use the bathroom so I went inside and one of the bathroom was In bad shape, that's what another customer told me so I wait for another one and when I was inside, I heard somebody go inside another bathroom and start to complain and talk loud loud about the people to come to the location when I open the door was one of the employee And she told me I cannot use the restroom. It's only for customers. I told her I use the drive-through. She was really nasty and disrespectful. I asked for her name. She told me she's the manager Rhonda. She was African-American lady. Really rude is not my fault to somebody make a mess in another bathroom if she don't wanna take care to her store, I think somebody have to do her job and bring better customer service to the customers to buy coffee to pay her salary

This Starbucks location makes up FAKE RULES to be PETTY!

DO NOT RECOMMEND!!

I was a regular at this store and I ordered a cold brew nearly every morning with extra foam on the side. They said "if we have to use a side cup, then we have to charge you" and I was like "OK". Other locations never charged me but it was not worth an argument. So my coffee cost about $9/ day (which is kinda ridiculous!). So that's about $3k/yr!

One day I order my usual drink and the lady requests that the manager ALIVIA speak with me and she said "we can't serve foam on the side anymore for you. I can still serve your coffee though" and I wondered if this were a corporate policy or a fake fabricated policy created to be Petty for no reason ( I was always a kind and pleasant customer), so I emailed Starbucks corporate and as suspected this  "policy" was a shady lie. My best guess is that they thought I should be paying more than $9 for coffee everyday and didn't have a button to charge me more. Either way, they lie and make up fake rules because they don't care about your experience, they care about sucking every single penny out of you possible. There are other examples I could give of my experience at this store, but too long to post!
takes too long and the staff are not friendly
Really bad service this morning.  Don't work at 7am if you can't take orders correctly!

The service is pretty quick but the quality of their drinks is not that great versus other locations around Charlotte. The last time I was there, my matcha looked like it was 80% milk when I asked for 3 scoops. It also didn't have much of the lavender foam I asked for either. We have been here several times and it seems like the drinks are made half-assed. I have worked in customer service jobs before so I understand how being busy can cause someone to make mistakes but we were the only ones in line so not sure why the quality of their drinks are subpar.

Y'all need to do better y'all didn't put coffee sleeves on the cups and there's sleeves laying out on the counter people here are just lazy y'all need to hire better people that wanna work. Also, y'all need to update items on your app. If you're out y'all need to do better at this.
Bad service
Coffee ,there  is a drink here for everyone.
2 stories is nice

The drive through is a parking lot; I'm not sure why. Starbucks is always so incredibly quick, and keeps the line moving. I was parked 5-7 minutes between each individual car, in a line of easily 8. The parking lot design traps you in, until you're the third car from the window. -- word to the wise, do not stop at this one unless you have a lot of time to kill; you'll get it done faster walking into the Harris Teeter. They were friendly to order, but something is going wrong inside timing wise.
Olivia really took the time to make my morning way better and less expensive! Thank you Olivia for jumping in and delivering such an AMAZING customer service. Great job!

Ordered a Venti Hot Latte with an extra shot of expresso and made with chocolate chip sweet cream and no way did my latte had any of those add ons that I asked for $9.08. Totally pathetic from this location and never give my dime to this starby. Totally terrible.
Very clean, nice atmosphere.  Staff are nice and easy going.  Exactly what you want when shopping anywhere.

Waited 25 mins in line.  Got my coffee.  It was cold.  Called the store... talk about rude.  Went back and had to wait again.  So my whole picking up coffee was a 40 min ordeal.  Not sure who is in charge but a few things.  Train your baristas to be nicer.  Get control of your busy times.  It should not take 20 mins to get coffee especially when there's four cars ahead.
Rude barista.
This is a terrible location. The lines are super long and staff are irritable.

I always come here and get a free complimentary water and today when I went through the drive thru a lady with a horrible attitude told me they shouldn't have given me free water in the past and I need to purchase something to get the water I looked online and cannot find where it said you have to purchase something to get a water I then went inside and a nice lady named Autumn let me get the water but was then scolded by the same nasty lady telling her she can't do that I could tell that the lady upset Autumn with whatever she said she still gave me the water and I left but could not understand why the woman was so upset over a water it's sad but anyways if someone from Starbucks can tell me if this is a new policy that would be great also the woman who did all of this was an African American female that had on a hat I am also African American btw so this is not about that it's just about treating people how you want to be treated anyways thanks Autumn !

A friend of mine told me to try the Pecan Crunch Cold brew and I'm hooked!!! I've had one every morning for like a week and a half straight now hahahahah. Can't say enough about how good the coffee is!!!
This place always sucks to come to.
There was an issue with our order and some really nice blonde girl helped us. Thank you so much for our coffee!!

I had a really disappointing experience at this Starbucks drive-through. The staff member at the window was incredibly rude and unwelcoming. From the moment we pulled up, it felt like we were inconveniencing her. No greeting, no smile, and her attitude made the whole experience uncomfortable. I expect better customer service, especially from a place like Starbucks. Will definitely think twice before returning to this location.

(It was the African American female with a butterfly tattoo on her neck and a tan hat). Please encourage her to having a more positive attitude. Thank you!
I don't know why the reviews are so bad. I had good food, drinks, customer service, and wifi. I also got to pet a puppy...soooo pretty good experience overall.
Service is decent. But the drinks and coffee always mediocre.
Drive through drink was under-filled and I was left waiting while attendants were chatting. I won't be returning to this location. Unacceptable for a $5 cup of coffee.

This Morning I ordered a coffee and I wasn't sure of the kind I was looking for I ordered wrong and when I got to the window Ethan help to make it right ! He was wonderful Thank you so much Ethan. Customer service well done

They needed to brew the coffee for a cold brew vanilla cream so we had to wait but the girl offered a cheaper version stating it's about the same price when it wasn't nor money back for the iced coffee she was suggesting so we don't wait. Finally we get it and the ice was all melted as it looked like they poured hot coffee instead of cold brew.

The coffee tasted like horrible and the cake pop was very chewy the barista Johnny started yelling at me after I said, the cake pop tasted to chewy and my Coffee had a hair in it The atmosphere was very dirty seeing that all the mad customers dumped all their coffee on the floor and chewy cake pops

The customer service is absolutely horrible here! There are only two employees who are ever nice. All the others are so incredibly rude for no reason. They make their drinks pretty good but it's not worth being treated like that. I would absolutely never recommend this location!
For the time I wait for sandwich here, I could easily finish eating a meal at a good restaurant,
Great place, dog friendly outside and meet a new friend.  Staff is friendly and quick
The slowest Starbucks especially the  drive through. It's insane how slow it moves.

I really tried to give this location a chance and the benefit of the doubt. I have visited this location many times and each time I give it another chance, I'm disappointed. My drink orders are usually incorrect in fact, I've had more orders made poorly or incorrectly than correct. When visiting in-store, there is a lot of rushing around, which is likely the cause of orders being incorrect. I understand being on a timer, but accuracy should be more important than how fast the order is completed. I am not sure if all staff members know their drink size limitations, as I was previously informed that the Matcha Lemonade does not come in Trenta size, which is false. Customer service leaves much to be desired. My interactions with baristas have been a mixed bag. Baristas either seem confused or curt. I do love that they are conveniently close, but I'd rather drive further for better service.

Bad service, dirty

Slowly

Service is always so so slow. The team member just gossip with each other. There were 8 people standing waiting for there drink and when I went to ask how much longer ( my order said it would be ready at 10:40) she said it's coming...... yes I know it's coming but how much longer. It's 11. 20 mins past my time it said it was going to be ready.
Very busy with drive though but  I did get help inside in a timely fashion.
Excelenttttttyy Great job

I visit this location 3 times a week and the young lady making me drink order got upset because I stopped her making my drink incorrectly and then proceeded to say I didn't tell her I didn't want whip cream and I know I did because I had to repeat my order twice and I never get my drink with whip cream and her attitude was terrible. I called and spoke with the shift manager as I was pulling off and just let her know I did not appreciate the girls attitude towards me and she didn't have to give me anything free I just wanted her to be aware considering Starbucks is not cheap.

I normally come here as it is around the corner from my house. I just left there 5 minutes ago and went through the drive thru. I placed a mobile order. I was yelled at by someone (not the man at the window, but a woman) for not giving them enough time. She was very rude and yelled "for future reference, you need to give us 10 minutes because we JUST got the order". What is the difference between ordering at the speaker and ordering online? I can't give you 10 minutes when ordering at the speaker?? They were also slow.

I have been using this location on my way to work for several months and love the drive thru experience.   Service is great and order ac urate and thorough.    The security guard to move traffic doing during peak times makes it even better!
I have slowed down ordering Starbucks from this location, returning from Denver ,Colorado to my native state is a big disappointment!
I ordered a mocha latte with five shots of espresso and got a mocha latte with five pumps of chocolate

This location is the worst location in Charlotte. I highly believe corporate should audit this location of cleanliness and customer service! The customer service is so terrible I never want to step foot in here. Avoid this place like a plague. The drinks don't come out how they should. Yesterday, instead of the manager/ team lead in the afternoon being respective to someone's concerns she was dismissive.
The manager Stormy is amazing her energy is EVERYTHING!
This is the worst run Starbucks I've ever seen. It's always SO slow and no one seems to care. Also what is happening on this counter right now?? It's disgusting. Please do better.
Fast stop on the road for me. Very friendly and accommodating staff.

I typically come to this location since it is so close to me. I will start with the only positive! My order is always correct and it does taste good. My issue with this location was an incident I was involved in this morning 12/23/23 7:35am. Long story short I decided last minute to place an online order on my way to work for a tall latte (NOT TOO HARD OF AN ORDER. LOCATION WAS NOT BUSY). I will admit I ordered it about 1 minutes before pulling in due to like I said it being a last minute decision. Once I got there I went in the drive through and told them I have a mobile order etc and they told me to pull forward. The employee at the window said "It will just be a few minutes they are finishing making your drink." A different employee came up to the window who I was assuming was a "Shift Lead" of some sort and she told me "We have told you MULTIPLE times to please order 15 min ahead of time for your mobile orders and do not place it when you are here on our app. If you could ACTUALLY follow these instructions that would be great. Do not do it again" I was in absolute shock and said "okay". As I was waiting for my latte to be finished being made it finally hit me that she said "they have told me multiple times". I have never been told this by ANY location before. Nor have I "always" done that. Therefore I told the drive through worker that "his lead who spoke to me needs to be more kind and that I have NEVER EVER been told this before. The lead might have me confused with someone else. Approaching a customer like that was highly inappropriate and to always make sure she has her facts correct before making the assumption and pissing a customer right off." I am very angry and disappointed in the service I received today. If I was not heading to work I would have gone in the store and made a complaint to her face and speak or request to speak to whoever is above her. Customers who do not deserve these remarks do not need to have someone scolding them at 7:30am for NO reason. Recognize you clients/customers correctly before anything. Matter of fact TREAT ALL CUSTOMERS WITH RESPECT!
the lids were literally grimy and had gross stuff around the rim and then because of that got on the cup. tried to wipe it off and it doesn't. this was on all the plastic cups we had
I went to starbucks at 7:59 and was told they were closed and were waiting to open the door for me.
Great customer service!!

Todo sucio... Trabajan bajo presion pero sin coordinacion estaba colapsado... las mesas sucias, banos, pisos todo era un asco! Y demasiada espera por un simple tea, no volvere. Mala atencion, con malas caras.
Pulled up to the drive thru intercom and no one said anything.
The music is to loud
Busy.  Paying was complicated.
I used the restroom.

This is consistently the worst Starbucks in Charlotte. I've never waited less than 25 minutes for a drink, even when ordering 15 minutes ahead. Everyone who works here seems to hate their job, and they show it. The food is either cold or burned, and the drinks are far too often incorrect. I continue to come here because it's the most convenient location, but not anymore.

I stopped here on the way home from an appointment and got the new Christmas Coffee.  The drive thru line was long, but moved fast.  The people working there were super kind and the coffee was amazing!
The slowest location I've ever been to. One drink took over 30 mins to fulfill.

The absolute worst Starbucks I've been to. After waiting more than 20 minutes for one coffee on a couple occasions, I gave the location the benefit of the doubt for being short-staffed or having a bad day. Now, after several months of waiting at least this long every visit, compounded by rude staff, it is no longer defensible. Do yourself a favor and visit a different location.

Filthy location. Between cockroaches and employees with bad attitudes I avoid this location at all cost. All of the Employees that have been here A while are extremely rude And any new ones That are somewhat nice to the customers still seem miserable likely due to their treatment from the tenured employees. Coffee is always inconsistent. I can truly say that I have never had a coffee from the store that I liked. Once, in a blue moon, when I decide to give it, another chance, I am always reminded of why I shouldn't be there in the first place.
My morning bagel spot
Horrible place, highly not recommended. Service is shocking

Always a busy place. Drive through is badly needed in our area. Service usually pleasant and efficient. Longer drive thru line than normal today. Little bit dangerous for drivers coming and going. Everyone generally patient. The longer than usual time gave plenty of time to view the drive thru window. Just a hint, Starbucks, step back and take in a view from your customer's vantage point. The window shelf is Filthy and disgusting. Gave a view of the 98 cleanliness rating.

Well from a customer's point of view (today)
I did drive-thru which is so easy!

food is always fine. what's not is how much milk my coffee will have in it or got a pumpkin cold brew instead, that is also disgusting. I just don't get it.  I have told doordash, thinking it was just delivery, I went there personally. Harris Teeter or Carmel Rd are significantly better.
Super short handed but they were doing their best
I bought a sandwich through the app, and since it was not in stock, they sent me this. And they didn't give me my money back. They only gave me an empty bag.

Just walked out after paying for two coffee drinks and waiting for 10-20 mins.... Yes I'd rather waste my money then wait and ask for a refund for two drinks this location is pathetic. Enjoy stealing my money and not making any coffee.
Only come here if you've got plenty of time to wait, both drive through and walk in will take forever

The food and drinks here are always great but the service is absolutely terrible. I work across the street so I come here almost everyday and I have to wait 10-15 mins every time for them to stop playing around in the back and actually take my order. I'm all about having a good time at work and all but the way that they just talk about not wanting to be there and not wanting to assist people is just so rude. The guy behind me left and came back but they still weren't ready and they had no line whatsoever. when I finally complained I was the rude one.. lol

Went through the drive thru and asked if they could shake my iced americano because its always warm on the bottom with just ice at the top. I take a sip and it tastes like soap like literal soap and now my stomach hurts. God forbid you ask for something a little extra.
Too busy to say hello or take our order.  Three people were behind the counter too.

Once again disappointed in Starbucks. Messy dining room, people walking out because of wait to just order, staff messy no nice uniforms. Is there not a uniform anymore?  Acid washed jeans?  Printed tshirts? Shirts not tucked?

I have been waiting for 10 mins didn't get acknowledged at counter for over a min. Car after car going through the drive through but customers can't get attention at counter. 5 people behind counter.

Won't be back at this store.

Get it together! I stopped frequenting this location after getting my order wrong several times in a row last winter. Stopped by on a whim today and same deal. Definitely dairy and caffeine in my dairy free/ caffeine free coffee- yikes! I asked twice and the cashier at the window was like "yea, for sure your order is right" instead of just checking with the person who made it. If you don't want to work there- don't! But if you are going to be there . . .do your job.
Awesome!!

Overcharged me then argued that they were right! If I didn't catch it, I'd be out almost $14.00
Manager had to take over. Drink was not made properly after!
Rude staff, won't acknowledge you. I understand it's busy and burnout happens but it's hard to find that compassion as a paying customer. May be time for a change in career.

Just had the worst experience. The woman at the drive thru told me I was ruining her drive thru time due to my request. Then I called the supervisor to let them know my experience-- got hung up on and then was completely dismissed. Terrible customer service.
Went through drive thru. Gentleman working was very polite and friendly
This place would never ever pass food safety inspection.  Floor mats on the counter where drinks are served during business hours, filthy bathrooms and even a cockroach for a mascott.  Never again

We were in the drive-through, and, although we went through the line pretty fast by the time we got up to the window. It took at least 15 minutes to get 2 Frappuccino's. The server did not even apologize for the long wait. And needless to say, the drive-through was very backed up by the time we left.
Drinks made as ordered. Fixed one that was an honest mistake promptly and politely. Enjoyed the little upstairs area for a quick business meeting.
Se disfruta de un ambiente agradable

Employees are generally nice but the drive through line is so bad with how the parking lot is set up. People waiting in line block the only exit for others who have already gone through the drive through and are trying to get out, which means the line can't move at all and it takes longer for everyone (through no fault of the workers). I brought up to one of the employees that maybe they could put up a sign that just says "Do not block exit" to the cars joining the line, which seems like a pretty feasible and effective solution? The employee just said "yeah I don't know, if people are impatient there's nothing I can really do about it." When I tried to suggest putting up a sign and said I'm not blaming them, he just asked if I wanted a receipt and then said "have a nice day" totally dismissing me lol. Kinda makes it seem like they don't care about customer feedback on what seems like a very easily solved problem. Weird!

Great standalone Starbucks with a drive through. Team is always so nice and works very hard -- the drive-thru line is always SO long, it's like they cannot take a breathe some mornings. That said, the inside of the store looks over utilized by customers, who don't seem to remember to pick-up after themselves. The furniture looks a bit over-loved and customers often leave messes behind when they leave the store. The outdoor seating is nice, though it is attached to the parking lot so if there is a car line you almost feel like you're a part of it. Great for mobile orders, too.
Muy tranquilo, habitaciones limpias, buen servicio
Very rude workers and yelled at us, never gave us our drinks because they were out but the didn't tell us that until it's been 30 minutes since we ordered. Hated this place, never coming back
the stuff was very rude!

Ordered a pink drink with no strawberries, was handed the drink with strawberries so I asked if it could be remade. Watched the girl scoop the strawberries out (which still left little pieces of it) decided to just deal with it and when pulling off and tasting my drink the lid tasted like men's cologne.

This location is nice...normally challenging driving in due to location and sharing the space with the apartment garage. Its such a small lot. My drinks are never made right at this location, and I rarely come here; only when convenient.
Either they don't  use full pumps or they don't add them at all when requested. I can tell the difference immediately upon the first sip. I am a contractor and drive all over the Charlotte/Pineville/Waxhaw areas. This is the ONLY location where I do not get my money's worth. Staff is nice, but I'm spending money on a drink. It seems like all the low scored reviews are easy fixes, but will it improve?...I doubt it. Haven't been to this location in over 6 months, but it's a disappointment each time. Now that prices have increased and rewards received are lower, there is even less to look forward to at this location. More money and less stars is a corporate issue. But consistent, poorly made drinks are no good for such a well-known corporation/brand.
Terrible customer service

Very disappointed ! Order a venti matcha tea with no ice. The lady in the drive through replied it will not be full and some will be missing.(never have had a starbuck tell me this. They usually  fill it up. My husband  and i drive up to the window. We saw the drink sitting there it was full to the top. The drive through lady takes the cup and pours out about 1 cup of it and hands it to me.  Milk dripping  down the side of the cup and every. Very disappointed  in this service  provided  today.
Caramel Macchiato was great!
15 mins for a shot of espresso. Two stars for the number people working out of 5

Lady working the drive thru between 3-4pm today was extremely rude and very aggressive. They were very busy in the drive thru and apparently she does not work well under pressure. This surprises me because it is the same lady pictured below by user "Kno" w stated she was very calm  That was 2 months ago so maybe she is burnt out by now. Nonetheless I would not put her in a customer facing position because it was very off putting and makes me less likely to return to this store. I was trying to decide what I wanted and after asking twice if there was "anything else" the third time she SCREAMED "ANYTHING ELSE"? aThen with my I was already upset with her attitude but when I asked for a straw and drove off because I had had enough she hung out the window and SCREAMED "THANK YOU" wow just wow lady time for you to move in this is very ooor customer service. Given all the low ratings maybe corporate needs to just shut this store down.

I have experienced some of the worst experiences at this location. I really try not to order from this location unless I'm running behind due to I have to pass this establishment daily to get to my business. The barista's at this location lack empathy and customer service. This was my last time coming here and I'm not surprised that when I came to write a review they only have 3 stars that speaks volumes right there. I spoke with the manager and explained what was wrong with my drink and the only explanation she could provide was oh we're trying to come back from Covid not how may I fix the issue. I ordered the strawberry Acai with extra sugar. They left out the dry strawberries but when I went it other drinks were being prepared with them for me to be told oh I just opened those. Excuse me ma'am did you not think to open them early on when you see you were running out. The drink is was very watery with lemonade added. Skip this location if you can that's all I will say.

This is a beautiful store (two floors) with a drive through that runs nonstop. From what I saw the folks that work there do a fantastic job in a very high stress/volume situation. Even so, this will be my first and last visit to this store due to an extremely unpleasant experience I had there with my family on a cold pre Christmas evening.

My daughter was home from school and we stopped into this Starbucks store for a warm drink and to catch up. Our drinks were perfect and we went upstairs to get away from the draft that blew when the doors opened.

There was an older masked man sitting at the corner table hidden behind a backpack and open laptop on his table that stared at me menacingly as I took a table by the window out of his view.
My daughter came up behind me and said that he stared at her with both middle fingers straight up. I thought nothing of it and we started chatting.
At one point he walked into my view to peer over the railing down stairs. He kept shaking his hand at me as if to shoo us away. That caught my attention!
When we finished and were preparing to leave, he glared at us and again raised his middle finger. I asked him from across the room what he was doing and he said with a sneer "F@&K YOU"! With my family there I did not want to engage any further so we quickly went downstairs to speak to the staff.
They described him and unapologetically said they knew exactly who he was. The whole time he glared down at us from upstairs. We got the feeling that at this Starbucks store it was accepted that an abusive obscene masked man owns the upstairs lounge and it was not a family oriented store so we left.
As we walked to our cars he continued his one finger salute from the upstairs window near the table we were just sitting at.
Both my wife and daughter -who are avid Starbucks customers- said they were glad I was there or they would have not felt safe and further said they would not return either.
Love that it has 2 stories. Don't see a lot of Starbucks stores with 2 levels.
Just waited 45 minutes for my drinks. That is absurd. When busy, the manager needs to stop accepting mobile orders. There were about 20 drinks at one point from mobile orders who weren't even there.

They were three workers down and the three employees on staff were working their butts off to get us our orders even though it was 40 minutes late. The lady pictured was really calm and collected despite the hustle and stress.
Always great here. Enjoy the staff. Super friendly and helpful.
Fast  service . Very kind Staff  . Recommend to all !
Love their breakfast sandwiches and the Caramel Crunch Frap....my FAV!
Got cup coffee after game was pleasant and enjoyable

I had an excellent experience at Starbucks near South Park. My daughter had an ear appointment so I ordered on the app.  Even though I chose drive thru and I met some very nice employees and I hope that I put a smile on their faces for the rest of the day because I told them how thankful I was that they were there and working to keep us fed! Thank you so much for making our delicious coffees as always
Daniel is a very great worker! Very considerate & Can perfectly Multitask.
Super hip location.

Absolutely the SLOWEST Starbucks drive thru I have ever been to. design of the parking lot/drive thru is horrible and inefficient. I don't know what it is, but every time I come here it is always a 20+ minute wait in the drive Thru.

Very busy location -- people are friendly & work hard to get the orders out fast -- bustling -- maybe some of the negative reviews are from folks who have "high maintenance" orders?  Go in & watch them work ... no one is standing around -- go there often and it is a great atmosphere -- thank you!

I walked into StarBucks, no one Greeted me. I had a feeling this location was a bad choice. I went to RestRm. Tissue all over floor.Dining Floors appear filthy. I went upstairs to look, as I was a 1st time Visitor of this location. No problem. Came back downstairs to see if I would get acknowledged. One lady said hi, then another said I will be with you shortly. I asked for a Bus. Card, so I could contact Corp. Off. No cards. Asked for Mgr. She was a lady who stood before me but never Greeted. They were comfortable not Greeting anyone. Check Reviews before you get bad Service. I'm planning to contact Corp. on Mon. Nasty location with a 97.5 rating.

I went through the drive thru and as soon as I heard the employees voice I figured I was going to get a bad customer service which I did. It seemed like the employee did not want to work. I got a simple drink and asked for extra caramel drizzle. When I pulled up to the window, the employee didn't say hi or anything just the price. I saw another employee give her my drink which she held up, looked at it confused and proceeded to hand it to me. There was no extra caramel drizzle in my drink and on top of that they filled it up to the top to the point where it was spilling out. She didn't offer a straw and when I asked for one it felt as if I bothered her for asking. Surprised on the bad customer service at this Starbucks!

Terrible customer service and the drinks taste different compared to other Starbucks stores. I ordered a Strawberry Acai Lemonade drink but they gave me the regular Strawberry Acai drink without the lemonade because they were out of lemonade even though I paid for the lemonade. No refund, no other options provided. They also didn't know how to make the dragon drink I ordered as well. It tasted bad. Never coming back here as long as the same employees with bad customer service work here.
My daughter has turned me into a Starbucks fan. We always order the vanilla bean frap and I love the acai strawberry lemonade. Very refreshing and delicious.
I thought this was just a novelty mug store, but they also sell coffee, day-old pastries and juice!
Good as they can get
Clean inside, nice upstairs, quick service.
Good location for a meeting
Long wait and gave me wrong drink it was still good tho lol
Excelente
Muy amables y muy buenas cajeras
My drink was fantastic an my barista was very sweet young lady
Customer service here needs coaching.

The hours on Google are incorrect. It lists the drive-thru as closing at 8:30 pm Monday through Friday and 9:30 pm on weekends, and these hours were confirmed by the business one week ago. When I went through the drive-thru this evening (a Saturday), they said they closed at 8. The drinks from this location are usually not very good and the customer service is always very marginal.

So sorry if this is personal for a review but about 2 months ago we unexpectedly lost our sweet dog and I just needed to stay out of my house as much as possible. I thought I could at least make it to the Starbucks drive through without breaking down but as soon as I pulled up the window and saw the pictures of the dogs I immediately broke down.  The woman at the window was so kind, told me she was so sorry and asked how she could help, and gave me a couple of gift cards.  I know that seems like not a big deal but to me on that day it meant everything.  I actually went in there in person for first time today and every single employee greeted me and asked how I was.  I'm with my children full time so I don't go too many places alone these days but this will forever be my go to spot when I need some peace (and some great service).  Thank you!
So slow.
Great place but unfortunately it's now closing super early on the weekends ( 8pm ) witch it's really annoying.
Really nice Starbucks, but ridiculously long drive thru line and very little parking in the parking lot.

By far the worse customer service of any starbucks in the chatlotte Area both shifts lied about the company policy for catering and didn't want to give me corporate number I will not put there names in here but you shouldn't have rude people with racist undertones at your location in this area this will not help your business. The most disrespectful employees work here buyer beware go to the Park town location or East Blvd if you want to be treated with respect.
Casey/KC/not sure how to spell it, was great. Thank you!

Its a pretty good Starbucks. Great size with a second floor, they're drinks were good, staff was kind and overall just a nice calm experience. Only downside someone may see here is that they are usually pretty busy at this location so if you want something quicker try another if you have the time :)
Ariste exuperetese
Varista had an attitude. Tge place was not clean
I love coming to this Starbucks as everybody here is super friendly. I've been regulars at many coffee places through my travels and the consistency here is
Gets busy in the morning til about 12, was a bit noisy for me to work, but in the afternoon it's more relaxed. Lots of tables set up for people to work from.
Isa and Darrell were fantastic baristas, they had exceptional customer service and made the best drink suggestions.
Consistently the slowest Starbucks I've ever been to! Do. Not. Go. There! Terrible..

Starbucks was nice.. Starbucks was cheery.. I went to Starbucks with my special deary. She had coffee of some fruity variety.. I just decided no coffee Me. I'd just.. Try a Tea.. Our order was searved.. By a young man with a brite big smile.. A courteous manner And With flair and with style.. His poney tail looked soft and oh so shiny.. Told my wife I want one and then I got all whiney. So we had our drinks.. Made merriment with the staff.. All those young poney tails.. They Did make us laff.. A great nite was had for us and these memories well keep...We tipped well.. Cause hair product.. Well it ain't cheap. Starbucks is coffee.. Can be bought anywhere.. But the staff here.. Are nice.. And they seem to really care. That is my story.. That is my tale.. Come here.. Enjoy.. And tip well. The life you save.. WILL have a poney tail..The end
Really dirty store. This location needs some help - it's constantly dirty, slow and none of the employees seem happy.
Good location. Has a drive thru but also offers indoor seating. They also have two floors to choose from. The staff was friendly and made my experience memorable.
Only drive thru is ridiculous and unhealthy completely opposite with a relax and active life

I can't wait to come get my birthday drink cause this location UNDERSTANDETH a true coffee drinker's struggle! Coffee is my jumpstart so great customer service can't be sacrificed for this reason and I keep having such pleasurable experiences here! Thanks, crew!

Not LGBTQ+ friendly!!!! Misgendered twice in less than 3 mins, when brought to attention received a condescending alright with a flippant attitude. This is after waiting 7 minutes at speaker in the drive thru, only one in line, followed by another 6 at the window. Tuesday 2 Oct 2021 6:35pm.

Stay way away from this store from 6 am-12 pm because they have absolutely what they are working on. Taking orders getting mobiles in. Telling people they are at the wrong store. Then half order showing up and drinks not showing up. Asking people what they orderers are people have no idea where their stuff is it is absolutely craziness they are massively understaffed

Coffee and service were fine.  Don't go here to work though, since it is very loud even with very few patrons.  AND there are very few parking spaces. Not everyone lives or works on that block!  Drive up line was in the street.
The staff is always very nice. I'm thrilled they have an Impossible breakfast sandwich.
People aren't kidding by saying this is the slowest one ever. Drive-through line is rough, 20 minutes for one cold coffee is a lot of wait (especially when it's 1pm on a Wednesday).

Thank you so much Aaron for making my Pink Drink today. He made it just right. His customer service was unmatched from taking my order to making my drink. I could see him smiling through his masks. I wish all of my customer service experiences were like
Slowest drive thru ever. I literally cannot comprehend why it takes 20 minutes every morning to get a coffee. All employees move at a snail pace. Please improve its not hard to do.

I try to give this Starbucks the benefit of the doubt time and time again, but they continually disappoint. Service is the SLOWEST and most inefficient I've ever seen- I always wait in line for at least 20-40 minutes. The workers always seem miserable & the actual product is inconsistent. Definitely in need of new management or efficiency training. Will not be wasting my time trying to come to this location anymore.
They seem to be doing much better now with new management.
Are you guys open or what? Every day is different and the number to call no longer works.
Terrible driver through service. Not enough staff... lines are ridiculous.
Tasty drinks and friendly staff.
Long wait times and they messed up my order on two occasions.
Great store! The drive-thru here isn't as bad as some folks make it out to be; consider that we're lucky to have a coffee shop with the option!
Good

As of 5/31/21 the store is still not open. This is one of those locations still using Covid as an excuse to do half of their job. You can't go in to pick up an online order or to just go through the line so you'll be sitting in the drive-through for half an hour.

This is the most aggravating Starbucks because they are never open during the hours listed on google. I have arrived here many times over the past two years because it is in a convenient location and no matter what time of the day they always seem to be closed. This morning I found a hand written sign on the drive through window stating they open at 6 now not 5am.... other times no signs just closed
The worst customer service and branch of sb.
Never open for mobile preorder
This particular Starbucks is always closed for in store pick up or ordering. So inconsistent.
Close early and when they are open no mobile orders allowed and you wait in drive thru over 20 minutes! No way I am returning

Hands down the worst Starbucks I have ever been to. It is right by my work so I have been here many times. Pre-covid they got my order wrong on several occasions, and the staff was not the friendliest. Now order-ahead is hardly ever available or the store is closed altogether. When they are open it only seems to be the drive-thru, which is already poorly designed and causes traffic to backup. I now only go to this location if I am absolutely desperate for coffee. I wish that corporate would address this as they are probably losing a lot of the business from nearby hotels and offices.

This location is absolutely in the WRONG spot. The drive thru is 100 feet from main intersection in Charlotte NC.  Why in the world would any builder or franchise owner want a STARBUCKS on the corner of a busy intersection? I had no problem with the Frappuccino nor the service from the attendant.  But the wait in line was horrendous.  The parking lot is suitable for only 5 cars. Ridiculous!
The drive thu is convenient...when it's open. This location needs new mgmt.
Drive thru moves quickly. Friendly staff & drinks were made corrextly.

What's going on with this location? They are always closed in the middle of the day. I'm assuming it's because they can't find employees to work because so many people are on unemployment now. When it is open the drive thru line is ridiculously slow. Come on Starbucks Corporate help this location out!
Slowest drive thru in the world, sadly. Perfectly nice staff and good coffee but the design of the drive thru and possibly bad management makes it a chore
Definitely a Starbucks fan/addict and have been for years!

Imagine my surprise visiting this location after work today to see that it has closed early, yet again. What's going on with this Starbucks location that it seems to be closed early,  frequently over the past few weeks? Are they short staffed? Do they need to hire more workers? Is the District Manager and Regional Manager aware of the early closures? How do they plan to solve this? Do they not know how to hire effective managers to properly run a store? The other locations in the area appear  to be doing well and haven't been closing early. What's wrong with this location? Seems they may have some issues that need to be addressed. I think this is my sign to support local coffee houses from here on out.
Work on customer service skills drinks were fine

This "drivethru" is insane. Nodbody understands how to navigate. The line typically extends in the intersection. Its an accident waiting to happen. Also they got my order completely wrong today after waiting in that line forever... gonna try to never go back to this location.
Always great service food and coffee !
Poor organization
Surprisingly fast. Very efficient. Don't trust Starbucks app regarding Out of Stock items. Friendly service!

Always a big long line at the drive thru that blocks traffic and makes it where folks that just wanna come in and get a drink cant even get in. Even when you can finally get past all the cars and get in there it takes forever cause of all the people in the drive thru. This place is a joke. They dont do nothing to stop all the cars from piling up. Trust me stick to the ones that dont have drive thrus.
Ricos y deliciosos cafes
They are never open!!!!!! They don't ever legit have a reasoning behind it.
Excelente atencion

Thank you so much for the wonderful staff here. I love being a partner and coming into a positive experience before they even realize that I'm a part of the company. They did such an amazing job making sure everyone was taken care of and ensuring items were coming out and and updating us in the status of our order.  They were very busy but very attentive to everyone.  Thank you for all you guys do. Keep up the great work!

Not sure what's up with the ridiculously long drive thru wait. I have never been in and out of this place in less than 20 minutes for just one drink. This location is closest to my house but I'll have to start going elsewhere. They do always get my drinks right and have friendly service though.
It was a Cool Experience nothing to major. They all was nice was drinks came up swell  so Nothing to frantic.

Here I am 25 minutes later sitting in line for a freaking hot coco......
Y'all gotta be crazy! And once you're in the line, you're STUCK. I will never come back here
It was quick. I don't do starbucks. I was going for someone else.
I go there every morning for coffee, great services!
25 minute average wait for an iced coffee in drive thru. Consistently THE slowest Starbucks I've ever been to.

This is my second time at this starbucks- first time the wait was 45 minutes for one pink drink with awful customer service. My most recent visit I ordered an iced caramel macchiato with extra caramel. I got a iced black coffee with milk. Will not be coming back. Do not reccommend.

Consistently friendly staff but can never get my order correct. The sad part is they recite my order back to me; however, the product is never the same. It's very disappointing as it's the closest Starbucks to my house, but I've decided that I'll  drive the additional miles to another location.

Horrid little store. "Manager" berated me for walking to the store and not having a car when I am environmentally conscious! I was told the store was randomly closed for no apparent valid reason and the drive thru was for "vehicle owners only". I was denied a coffee ! The owners (franchisee I am sure) don't seem to care about the negative reviews. If I had to guess, I would say they are "closed" so that they can cut back on payroll yet maximize drive through revenue right now before the tax year ends in order to make some big savings at the employees and customers expense. Boycott this store and head to the Starbucks on Carmel road (1 mile away down Sharon road in the Harris Teeter shopping center), that store is OPEN, and FRIENDLY. Far superior. Give your money to that owner instead!
Great visit as usual. I've had a drink messed up a few times but they are always happy to fix it.
Worst starbucks around. Yelled at for "being closed" when there is no sign. Not to mention is closed yesterday as well. They never have nitro cold brew either. Drive thru takes a solid 15 mins.
don't come here if you are in a hurry the wait is always at least 20 minutes Always
Not sure why this starbucks is still in business? super slow and rude...
So. Incredibly. Slow.
The line was SUPER long and I couldn't wait. You could tell they were understaffed
My favorite place
Slowest Starbucks I've ever been to.

Was just yelled at by the employee taking the drive-thru orders.  Started to place my order and I was abruptly interrupted with "I SAID GIVE ME A MINUTE!!" So, I SAID "Ill take my business to Caribou." Would rather go out of my way to a different coffee shop entirely than start my Sunday morning off dealing with that customer service suck fest.
Love them hate the long drive thru lines. But I understand why
Employees very courteous, however not enough staff to cover drive thru...I waited close to 10-15 minutes
never open when it says it is
Good location and friendly staff
Delicioso
I always like Starbucks. I've never been to a bad experience.
The single worst coffee place ever created. Not Starbucks, just this location.
Outstanding service.
Great quick service  ..

It's a pretty standard Starbucks but with a drive-thru! One of the few in Charlotte and with the recent "pandemic" super convenient to just go through the drive-thru. The staff have always been pleasant and patient even though the lines have been wrapped around the building the couple of times I've gone.

Horrible experience.  They couldn't wait to get rid of you and just asking for sugar and coffee stirrers got you the looks and attitude. Very very rude personel.....shame on you for not caring for your customers...
Great customer service! Goes above and beyond for nurses!
Didnt like how there last inspection was in February.  The guy in drive up had no gloves.

This Starbucks is convenient and stays busy, but service is horrible and slow. I mobile ordered 5 minutes before I got to the location. I parked and walked up to the "Mobile Pickup" window (door with table in front of it). I stood there for several minutes (3 to 4) while watching 3 employees standing behind the counter talking. There was one girl working making coffee and managing the drive through window. Finally one of the talkers noticed me and asked "can I help you with something?" I responded I had a mobile order. She said it's coming, and I watched her pull several labels off the printer and put them on cups, one of these was my beverage (I noticed the Splenda packets) and she finished making my drink made a couple of others and then brought me mine. On my way back to my car I noticed the drive through line was longer and the car that pulled in behind me had not made it to the menu/order board. Long story, if you want to wait a long time for a mediocre cup of coffee then by all means go to this location, if you want good service and a good cup of coffee go to the Starbucks at Park Towne Village!
Slowest drive-thru in all of Charlotte. It doesn't matter the time of day, nor amount of people in front of you. It's ALWAYS slow! 20-30 minutes minimum.
A good run to quite and cozy place.
Poor and rude service.
Fresh and hot
Robert was super helpful! He noticed his team needed help while he was at the register and he jumped right in. Thanks Robert!

This location was very slow, the barista did not want to redo the order which he admitted he got it wrong. He forgot to put the Carmel drizzle on the frappes and also gave us two butterscotch frappes instead of one vanilla bean and one butterscotch smh  not the ideal Starbucks experience

Waited 20 minutes in the drive thru line. 20 minutes... Think about that. I've had dentists clean my teeth faster. After I got my drink and pulled off, it was the wrong drink. I order a White Mocha, they have me a peppermint mocha. Easily confused wording there. "White" sounds just like "peppermint".
Classic Starbucks
Love the cleanliness of this place.
Coffee is my best friend! I love this store, great staff and quick service!
It's a Starbucks, they sell coffee, what do you expect?
Coffee tasted watered down

This location has so much drive thru business in the mornings.. not a convenient stop for coffee if you go inside. And they allowed a homeless man, or vagrant, to sit in the corner and sleep with all of his belongings.  I was there 2.5 hours- he slept the whole time.
I had a great experience at this location. The line was very long this morning but they kept it moving very quickly! I had time to spare.
Great Coffee and service.
Inefficient, just like other reviewers said.

Ordered a Citrus Defender tea. I asked what was in the different Citrus teas and one of them had peaches. I specifically told the drive-through person I was allergic to peaches. The sticker on my drink said Citrus Defender.... but the tea that they gave me was the peach tea. Almost ended up in the hospital because someone couldn't do their freaking job.

When I went to return the tea and told them why I was returned in it I got straight up attitude from the people at the counter. Don't go there!!!! they don't know how to do their job and they have horrible service.
Comments from staff
Expect your drink to take 15+ minutes even if it's a mobile order. Drive through is always backed up as well.
Went through the drive-thru today. William was SO pleasant as I waited for my second drink. His upbeat personality and smile really made my day :)
Good service

I like this Starbucks because it is close to my house and they have a mezzanine separated from main floor where you can get work done. The only negative is the drive-thru almost always gets backed up. Use mobile order if speed is in need. Oh and coffee.

Just ordered the caramel brulee latte. It was made completely wrong. I was so excited to try something new. It tasted just like the white mocha that I always get. Very disappointing. The girl at the window did not give me my receipt. Highly unprofessional.

This pour over Christmas Blend I'm enjoying at this Stabucks may be the best cup of coffee I've had in 2019...the perfect strength, a blend of bitterness and smoothness...allowing the subtle tones come through. Well done, Starbucks Staff!
After waiting in the drive through line over 20 minutes they forget to give me my debit card back after paying.  Everytime I have tried this location the service us terrible

Spent over $11 for two drinks and basically had blended ice that had no coffee flavor with a splash of caramel flavor if anything. We first were given someone else's order (drive thru) and then our order. Both went in the trash with the spend. Losing any and all hope in a caffiene fix from Starbucks, period.
Drive through is the slowest known ever. What is the protocol for how many are to attend to making drinks if this is the busiest? Lordt

Every time I come to this location they cut me off when I'm speaking at the drive through. If you ask for additional syrup in your iced coffee they tell you it comes with classic, I understand that but I wanted additional. So when I get my iced coffee not only is there no additional syrup like I asked for 3 times there wasn't even classic when I specifically ordered it sweetened. Their customer service is terrible. I'm sick of paying 3.50 for an iced coffee that isn't even correct. Let alone basically having my card and drink thrown at me. Will not be returning!!!
Slowest drive-through in history

This Starbucks was pretty crowded the day I came.... But there's a parking garage just steps away from the store so parking was easy and there is a second floor just for seating so there was plenty of seating

The barista are stupid..
I order iced they give me hot
If I order hot they give me ice.
I waiting 30 minutes in the drive thru line.
This Starbucks drive through is super busy. Hard to get in and out not necessarily the employees fault just poor planning let's put a super Starbucks on a small lot!! Yeah yeah let's do it.
Pretty slow

The employees at this location need to be trained better on how to make drinks. I always get white chocolate mocha fraps that are coffee based and I know what they are supposed to look like. I ordered one at this location and it turned out white which isn't what it's supposed to look like. I informed the drive through attendant it's supposed to be brown because of the coffee and she was rude and said I was wrong. I didn't have time to argue because I was going to work, but this shouldn't happen. It was so bad I threw it out.
Wait time is long and my coffee experience has never been good at this location((
El cafe , es de calidad, solo eso vale la pena..
